subject: Headaches
body: Hi, I’ve been having persistent headaches every evening for the last 3 weeks. What should I do?

subject: Bill
body: Hello, I have a question about my bill. It dosn’t seem like it was processed through my insurance

subject: Med clarification
body:
Hi there!
I have a question about the beta blocker I was prescribed. I’m not sure if I'm supposed to take it in the morning or at night. Can you clarify?

subject: Cough not going away
body:
Hello

This cough I saw you about last week is still not going away. I’ve been taking the cough syrup you prescribed, but it doesn’t seem to be helping. What should I do next?
